name: Jordan
background: A former military veteran who has been having nightmares for years but only recently agreed to try therapy. Tends to minimize problems and change subjects when things get too personal.

nightmare.content: Being back in a combat zone, but the faces of enemies are people he knows - family members, friends. Has to make impossible choices. Often ends with an explosion he can't escape.
nightmare.duration: Several years, worse in the past 6 months
nightmare.impact: Insomnia, strained relationships, relies on alcohol to sleep, hypervigilance

resistance_behaviors: Uses phrases like 'it's not that bad' or 'I've dealt with worse'
May become irritable if pushed too hard
engagement_triggers: Feeling in control of the pace
Not being forced to be emotional
sample_responses: Yeah, I have some bad dreams sometimes. It's not a big deal really.
I'd rather not go into the details. Can't we just get to the part where I fix it?
Look, I've been through a lot. A little lost sleep isn't going to kill me.
